uuid.description: Unique agent identifier, required and must be a string.

hostname.description: Device hostname, required and must be a string.

mac_hash.description: SHA256 hash of MAC address, required and must be a string.

nickname.description: Human-friendly name for the agent, required and must be a string.

role.description: Assigned role for the agent (e.g., web_browsing, finance_excel), required and must be a string.

created_at.description: Timestamp for when the agent was created, required.
